## Description
This is a project on the influence of demographic characteristics on COVID-19 kinetics, which was performed as a part of "R for Bio Data Science" at DTU in the spring of 2020. The project includes an exploratory data analyses, survival analysis, PCA clustering, and a Shiny app developed on the data.
